title: Projects
text:
Clustering Analysis on Country Data | R | code, vignette

Implemented unsupervised clustering methods to group countries based on socioeconomic and health conditions

Modeling Japanâ€™s Activity Rates in the 21st Century | R | code, report

Modeled and forecasted monthly activity rates in Japan for the years 2000-2021 using time series data

Analyzing the 2020 Presidential Election | R | report

Explored the relationship between census data and the 2020 election results
Experimented with several classification models to predict the winning candidate for each county

Predicting Data Science and STEM Salaries with Permutation Tests and Bootstrapping | R | report

Used Monte Carlo methods to predict data science and STEM salaries

title: Projects
text:

Bingo Analysis | Python | code

Simulated bingo games to determine how often different types of bingos occur

Made a simple app to access the Spotify API, scrape Japanese song lyrics, and visualize their word frequencies

title: Interactive Audio Projects
text: Over the course of 6 weeks, I learned how to use Max, a visual programming environment for music and multimedia. Despite not having much knowledge in music theory/production, I came out of this class with several projects that I am quite proud of.

title: Interactive Audio Projects
text:
Assignment 1: Note Generator
Generates random notes within a major scale, with the scale changing every 4 seconds.

title: Interactive Audio Projects
text:
Assignment 2: Synthesizer
Synthesizer that incorporates oscillation, filters, and modulation.

title: Interactive Audio Projects
text:
Assignment 3: Variable-rate Sampler Instrument
Sampler using audio files and recordings.

title: Interactive Audio Projects
text:
Final Project: Sequence Generators
Generates random sequences of notes based on a Markov chain model, which is then passed through a synthesizer.
